data.name: subject_you_added
data.value: Welcome to Your TeamLab Portal!

data.name: pattern_you_added
data.value: [outdated]

data.name: subject_you_added_after_invite
data.value: Welcome to Your TeamLab Portal!

data.name: pattern_you_added_after_invite
data.value:
h1.Welcome to "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal!
Dear $UserName,
Your user profile has been successfully added to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
h3.Get started with your portal
# Edit your "profile":"$MyStaffLink" to add personal and contact details. # Use "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to start your blogs, forums, add events, photos, and more. # Create "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" and manage your workflow by adding milestones and tasks. # Upload, edit and organize "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/". # Manage your customer relations using "CRM":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/crm/" module, identify priority contacts, track communication history and sales performance. # Organize your work schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/" tracking tasks and milestones due dates. # Start "Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to chat with your team members online.
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"http://teamlab.com/help/helpcenter.aspx" . For any additional questions or feedback please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_profile_updated
data.value: Your Profile at ${__VirtualRootPath} has been Changed

data.name: pattern_profile_updated
data.value:
h1.Your Profile at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" has been Changed
Dear $UserName,
Your user profile details at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" have been changed by "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl".
To view your profile follow the link below: "$UserName":"$MyStaffLink"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.^

data.name: subject_pwd_reminder
data.value: [outdated]

data.name: pattern_pwd_reminder
data.value: [outdated]

data.name: subject_invite
data.value: Invitation to Join TeamLab Portal

data.name: pattern_invite
data.value:
h1.Invitation to Join TeamLab Portal
Hello $UserDisplayName,
$__AuthorName has invited you to join a portal at Teamlab - a corporate platform for document and project management. Join the portal and start collaborating with your colleagues right away.
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 48 hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_join
data.value: Invitation to Join ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_join
data.value:
h1.Invitation to Join "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" Portal
Hello,
You have requested to join the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal at Teamlab - a platform for document and project management. Join the portal and start collaborating with your colleagues or friends right away.
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 48 hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_self_profile_updated
data.value: ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal Profile Change Notification

data.name: pattern_self_profile_updated
data.value:
h1."${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal Profile Change Notification
"$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has changed his/her profile details at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
^You receive this email because you are an administrator of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you do not want to receive the notifications about profile updates, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: subject_user_has_join
data.value: New User Added to TeamLab Portal

data.name: pattern_user_has_join
data.value:
h1.New User Added to "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
"$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has joined your portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
^You receive this email because you are an administrator user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you do not want to receive the notifications about new users, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: subject_send_whats_new
data.value: What's New on Your Portal for $Date

data.name: pattern_send_whats_new
data.value:
h1.What's New on "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal for $Date
#foreach($activity in $Activities)
h2.$activity.Key
#foreach($whatsNewActivity in $activity.Value) #foreach($b in $whatsNewActivity.BreadCrumbs) h3.$b #end "$whatsNewActivity.Title":"$whatsNewActivity.URL" *Author*: "$whatsNewActivity.UserName":"$whatsNewActivity.UserAbsoluteURL", published: $whatsNewActivity.Date.ToShortTimeString()
#end
#end
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you do not want to receive the notifications about the new events on the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: subject_backup_created
data.value: TeamLab. ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal Backup Created

data.name: pattern_backup_created
data.value:
h1."${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal Backup Created
Dear $OwnerName,
A backup file containing data from your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal has been created. It is available for download under the following link: "$BackupUrl":"$BackupUrl"
*Note*: this link is valid for $BackupHours hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.
To learn more on the backup/restore procedure please refer to our "How to Create and Restore the TeamLab Portal Backup":"http://www.teamlab.com/content/CreateandRestoreBackup.pdf" PDF user guide.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_portal_deactivate
data.value: Deactivation of the ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_portal_deactivate
data.value:
h1.Deactivation of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested a temporary deactivation of your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$DeactivateUrl":"$DeactivateUrl"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deactivation process within that period.
You can reactivate your portal any time by clicking the following link: "$ActivateUrl":"$ActivateUrl" (this link has no time limit)
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_portal_delete
data.value: Deletion of the ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_portal_delete
data.value:
h1.Deletion of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested to permanently delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
*Important! All the data stored on your portal, as well as your registration details will be lost and cannot be recovered.*
If you still want to delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$DeleteUrl":"$DeleteUrl"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_dns_change
data.value: TeamLab. Change of Portal Address

data.name: pattern_dns_change
data.value:
h1.Change of Portal Address
Dear $OwnerName,
There has been a request to change the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal address to "$PortalAddress":"$PortalAddress" #if($PortalDns != "") ("$PortalDns":"$PortalDns" )#end.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$ConfirmDnsUpdate":"$ConfirmDnsUpdate"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal address change process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_confirm_owner_change
data.value:
h1.Change of "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal Owner
Dear $OwnerName,
There has been a request to change the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal owner to $UserName.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$ConfirmPortalOwnerUpdate":"$ConfirmPortalOwnerUpdate"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal owner change process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_confirm_owner_change
data.value: TeamLab. Change of Portal Owner

data.name: pattern_activate
data.value:
h1. You're Invited to Join $__AuthorName's "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" Portal
Hello $UserDisplayName,
$__AuthorName has invited you to join his/her portal at TeamLab platform - "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink".
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the operation within that period.
Joining $__AuthorName's portal you can:
* participate in blogs and forums, share news, photos, bookmarks, chat with $__AuthorName and other users; * create projects and manage your workflow by adding milestones and tasks, leading discussions; * upload, create, edit and share documents, spreadsheets, presentations and image files; * manage your customer relations, identify priority contacts, track communication history and sales performance.
You can also access it and keep track of all the recent news using your mobile phone.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_change_email
data.value:
h1.Email Address Change Request
You have requested to change your email address used to enter the TeamLab portal.
Please follow the link below to change your email address: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email change process within that period.
If you do not want to change your email or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_activate
data.value: Invitation from $__AuthorName to Join ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: subject_change_email
data.value: TeamLab. Email change request

data.name: pattern_change_password
data.value:
h1.Password Change Request for the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
There has been a request to change your password used to enter the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
Please follow the link below to change your password: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the password change process within that period.
If you do not want to change your password or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal administrator to find out the details.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_change_password
data.value: TeamLab Password Assistance

data.name: pattern_activate_email
data.value:
h1.Activate Your Email for "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" Portal.
Hello $UserDisplayName,
To start participating in the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal life you need to activate your email address. This is done for security reasons.
Please follow the link below or access the link by copying and pasting it to your Internet browser's address bar: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email activation within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_activate_email
data.value: TeamLab. Please activate your email address

data.name: pattern_change_phone
data.value:
h1.Mobile Phone Change Request
You have requested to change your mobile phone used to enter the TeamLab portal.
Please follow the link below to change your mobile phone: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your mobile phone change process within that period.
If you do not want to change your mobile phone or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_profile_delete
data.value:
h1.Removal of the Profile from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
You have requested to permanently delete your profile from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
If you still want to delete your profile please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the profile deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

"$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"

data.name: subject_for_admin_notify
data.value: User message to administrators

data.name: pattern_congratulations
data.value:
h1.Welcome to TeamLab!
Dear $UserName
Your portal has been created at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}"
h2.Get started with your portal "Watch video":"http://www.teamlab.com/Help/Video/TL-FreeBusiness.aspx"
* - "Invite employees":"${__VirtualRootPath}" to join your portal. * - Change your company "name and logo":"${__VirtualRootPath}/management.aspx?type=7", as well as many other portal settings. * - Edit your "profile":"${__VirtualRootPath}/my.aspx" to add personal and contact details. * - Use "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to start your blogs, forums, add events, photos, and more. * - Create "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" and manage your workflow by adding milestones and tasks. * - Upload, edit and organize "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/". * - Manage your customer relations using "CRM":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/crm/" module, identify priority contacts, track communication history and sales performance. * - Organize your work schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/" tracking tasks and milestones due dates. * - Start "Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to chat with your team members online.
If you need help with your portal we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"http://www.teamlab.com/ru/Help/helpcenter.aspx". For any additional questions or feedback please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com".
Follow us on !http://cdn.teamlab.com/facebook.png(Facebook)!:http://www.facebook.com/TeamLab !http://cdn.teamlab.com/youtube.png(Youtube)!:http://www.youtube.com/user/TeamLabdotcom !http://cdn.teamlab.com/twitter.png(Twitter)!:http://twitter.com/teamlabdotcom !http://cdn.teamlab.com/linkedin.png(Linked In)!:http://www.linkedin.com/groups?home=&gid=3159387&trk=anet_ug_hm
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://www.teamlab.com/"
^Ascensio System SIA^ ^Lubanas st. 125a-25,^ ^Riga, Latvia, EU,^ ^LV-1021^ ^Phone: +371 66016425^
^This email is generated automatically and you do not need to answer it. You receive this email because you are a registered user of "TeamLab.com":"http://www.teamlab.com/"^

data.name: subject_congratulations
data.value: Welcome to TeamLab Portal!
